definition: Minyue county in Zhangye 張掖|张掖[Zhang1 ye4], Gansu
folk music, esp. for traditional instruments
Minyue county in Zhangye 張掖|张掖[Zhang1 ye4], Gansu

sentences.english: Pig head, Juan, Lao Cao also joined the folk music that.
sentences.chinese: 豬頭，娟，老曹還有那個民樂的也加入。

sentences.english: Ladies and Gentlemen: there'll be a Chinese music concert.
sentences.chinese: 女士們先生們，一會將有一場中國民樂匯演。

sentences.english: But not all the news was bleak in the folk world in 2009.
sentences.chinese: 但2009年關於民樂界並非一片愁雲慘淡。

sentences.english: Even if some of them read the paper, they would say, Folk music?
sentences.chinese: 有的即使看了一下，卻說，民樂？

sentences.english: The manganese deposits of Min Le of Huayuan are the large manganeses carbonate deposits.
sentences.chinese: 花垣民樂錳礦牀是特大型的碳酸錳礦牀。

sentences.english: An Inside History of the Folk Music Revival in America.
sentences.chinese: 美國民樂復興密史》這本書的作者。

sentences.english: I have a comprehensive range of music from Beethoven to Chinese folk songs.
sentences.chinese: 我有很全面的音樂收集從貝多芬到中國民樂。

sentences.english: Which can provide some names of musical instruments commonly used in English?
sentences.chinese: 哪位能提供一些英語中常用樂器的名稱？民樂的。

definition: hulusi, aka cucurbit flute (a kind of free reed wind instrument)
